channel.title: 317 Command Help
channel.description:
hey, i wanna import a command in client.java. the command is ::rules
Could someone make a command that i can import and edit? thanks
--icepkers

item.title: 317 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“jj0001, post:10, topic:320046”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Help") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Help", 8144); //Title sendQuest("", 8145); sendQuest("Text here", 8148); sendQuest("Text here.", 8149); sendQuest("Text here", 8150); sendQuest("Text here", 8151); sendQuest("Text here", 8152); sendQuest("Text here", 8153); sendQuest("Text here", 8154); sendQuest("Text here", 8155); sendQuest("Text here", 8156); sendQuest("Text here", 8157); sendQuest("Text here", 8158); sendQuest("Text here", 8159); sendQuest("Text here", 8160); sendQuest("Text here", 8161); sendQuest("---=== Thanks for playing ===---", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Hope it Helped"); }relmitos is right it should not be there this is a fixed one.
it was just something i over looked.[/quote]

It’s still there…?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:7, topic:320046”][quote author=relmitos link=topic=416505.msg3062848#msg3062848 date=1260996018]
Why did you declare a substring?
[/quote]

Because jj0001 didn’t, he just ripped that out of some server.[/quote]i took it out of the server im using right now and cleaned it up unlike this one[quote=“hontiris1, post:4, topic:320046”]} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@gre@title.", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@red@Fire Cape Guide.", 8146); sendQuest("@whi@Make sure you scroll down. there is more at the bottom.", 8147); sendQuest("@blu@Fist off I'm going to inform you that fight caves", 8148); sendQuest("@blu@is only 7 waves.", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("@gre@Skills needed:", 8151); sendQuest("@gre@You get all the skills needed with ::pure, although you", 8152); sendQuest("@gre@will need 60 prayer +.", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuest("@blu@Items needed: (Range is recommended)", 8155); sendQuest("@blu@Good range armour I suggest Black D hide or Void.", 8156); sendQuest("@blu@Good arrows, I suggest Rune or Ice arrows.", 8157); sendQuest("@blu@10 Prayer potions.", 8158); sendQuest("@blu@1 Range potion.", 8159); sendQuest("@blu@Manta rays or Sharks.", 8160); sendQuest("", 8161); sendQuest("@gre@What to do in fight caves:", 8162); sendQuest("@gre@When you enter fight caves run to the Italy rock,", 8163); sendQuest("@gre@it looks like a giant boot, this will protect you from", 8164); sendQuest("@gre@level 180's.", 8165); sendQuest("@gre@Sometimes the Npc's won't spawn, just give it a few", 8166); sendQuest("@gre@minutes, If it doesn't spawn at all try Re-Logging.", 8167); sendQuest("@gre@When you get to TzTok-Jad you will need to use prayer,", 8168); sendQuest("@gre@he uses magic and range. When he stomps his legs", 8169); sendQuest("@gre@it means he is going top use a range attack, when", 8170); sendQuest("@gre@he stands up on his back legs it means he is", 8171); sendQuest("@gre@going to do a magic attack.", 8172); sendQuest("@gre@If you manage to get him below half hp his healers", 8172); sendQuest("@gre@will come and heal him, make sure you kill them all", 8173); sendQuest("@gre@Because they will continue to heal him.", 8174); sendQuest("", 8175); sendQuest("@blu@If you follow this guide you will get a Fire cape.", 8176); sendQuest("@blu@Hope this guide helped you, thanks - hontiris1.", 8177); sendQuest("@gre@ hontiris1 is the best firecaper", 8178); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

ermm a lil mest up well i think you would how it gouse dont got time to fix it[/quote]

item.title: 317 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @icepkers icepkers
item.description:
@icepkers wrote:

[quote=“jj0001, post:2, topic:320046”]is this what you mean??

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Help") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Help", 8144); //Title sendQuest("Scrol down", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Text here", 8148); sendQuest("Text here.", 8149); sendQuest("Text here", 8150); sendQuest("Text here", 8151); sendQuest("Text here", 8152); sendQuest("Text here", 8153); sendQuest("Text here", 8154); sendQuest("Text here", 8155); sendQuest("Text here", 8156); sendQuest("Text here", 8157); sendQuest("Text here", 8158); sendQuest("Text here", 8159); sendQuest("Text here", 8160); sendQuest("Text here", 8161); sendQuest("---=== Thanks for playing ===---", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Hope it Helped"); }[/quote]

thanks man

–ice

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @hontiris1 hontiris1
item.description:
@hontiris1 wrote:

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rules”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@gre@title.", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@red@Fire Cape Guide.", 8146);
sendQuest("@whi@Make sure you scroll down. there is more at the bottom.",
8147);
sendQuest("@blu@Fist off I’m going to inform you that fight caves", 8148);
sendQuest("@blu@is only 7 waves.", 8149);
sendQuest("", 8150);
sendQuest("@gre@Skills needed:", 8151);
sendQuest("@gre@You get all the skills needed with ::pure, although you", 8152);
sendQuest("@gre@will need 60 prayer +.", 8153);
sendQuest("", 8154);
sendQuest("@blu@Items needed: (Range is recommended)", 8155);
sendQuest("@blu@Good range armour I suggest Black D hide or Void.", 8156);
sendQuest("@blu@Good arrows, I suggest Rune or Ice arrows.", 8157);
sendQuest("@blu@10 Prayer potions.", 8158);
sendQuest("@blu@1 Range potion.", 8159);
sendQuest("@blu@Manta rays or Sharks.", 8160);
sendQuest("", 8161);
sendQuest("@gre@What to do in fight caves:", 8162);
sendQuest("@gre@When you enter fight caves run to the Italy rock,", 8163);
sendQuest("@gre@it looks like a giant boot, this will protect you from", 8164);
sendQuest("@gre@level 180’s.", 8165);
sendQuest("@gre@Sometimes the Npc’s won’t spawn, just give it a few", 8166);
sendQuest("@gre@minutes, If it doesn’t spawn at all try Re-Logging.", 8167);
sendQuest("@gre@When you get to TzTok-Jad you will need to use prayer,", 8168);
sendQuest("@gre@he uses magic and range. When he stomps his legs", 8169);
sendQuest("@gre@it means he is going top use a range attack, when", 8170);
sendQuest("@gre@he stands up on his back legs it means he is", 8171);
sendQuest("@gre@going to do a magic attack.", 8172);
sendQuest("@gre@If you manage to get him below half hp his healers", 8172);
sendQuest("@gre@will come and heal him, make sure you kill them all", 8173);
sendQuest("@gre@Because they will continue to heal him.", 8174);
sendQuest("", 8175);
sendQuest("@blu@If you follow this guide you will get a Fire cape.", 8176);
sendQuest("@blu@Hope this guide helped you, thanks - hontiris1.", 8177);
sendQuest("@gre@ hontiris1 is the best firecaper", 8178);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

ermm a lil mest up well i think you would how it gouse dont got time to fix it

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Command Help
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Sure here you go:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) {
	spoonfed();
}
